thread.title: Review of Stay
thread.title_full: Review of Stay - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, opposite Rockefeller Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kennethg938
title: Review of Stay
text:
Staff was very good, location was outstanding, but we were in room 2016 which we believed was a single room. The bed was a full sized bed, NOT a Queen. When I made the reservation I specified that there would be 2 people. Only my name was on the reservation and you gave me a very small room. It was too small for 2 people. The very good rating was based on location and service, not the room. Also, the electric outlets on the desk did not work properly. We were only able to use one of them. They need repair.
Room Tip: I don't know what you're looking for here. Room tip?? See more room tips
